title: The New ATLA Only Has 8 Episodes😱! #shorts
description:
The new live action Avatar: The Last Airbender just dropped today on Netflix, but with only 8 episodes, will they be able to fit all of the story in? Or will we end up with another chop shop story?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
